Title: One Perfect Day
Plot: Tara is elated when Ethan asks her to dance in his choreographic assessment piece. Is he finally beginning to see her as a romantic potential? But when she arrives at the studio to find Ethan engrossed in conversation with his mentor ? the talented, gorgeous and much older Dana Strong ? it's obvious who Ethan has his sights on.
